title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button on the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When using the JAR packager, the user is unable to create a JAR file and receives an error message stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file in the project. 
2. Make changes in the file without saving. 
3. Open the JAR packager for the project. 
4. Enter all the necessary information such as file paths, destination, JAR name, and description in the JAR packager. 
5. Press the 'Finish' button to create the JAR file.
